"Rediah": "Very well. Let me tell you a bit about Material Storage."
"Material Storage is a separate storage that can hold Gathering items and various other materials."
"It even allows you to store Special Ability Capsules, as well as certain other items."
"Material Storage has a huge storage capacity, so it's really quite useful."
"You can gain access to Material Storage through the use of a Ticket."
"I'll walk you through it. First, open up the Shop from your Main Menu."
